description: Love hot cinnamon donuts? Then these cinnamon sugar popovers are for you. Easy to make and no frying required – these will soon become a favourite.
keywords: Popover,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Spring,Sesame free,Baking,Oct 2020,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Cinnamon Sugar Popovers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 225°C/205°C fan-forced. Divide 1 tsp oil among 8 holes of a 12-hole, 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan. Place pan in oven for 5 minutes or until hot.
Place milk and eggs in a bowl and whisk until well combined. Add flour and vanilla, whisking well to combine.
Carefully remove pan from oven. Pour batter evenly among pan holes. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown and well risen.
Meanwhile, to make the cinnamon sugar, combine cinnamon and sugar in a bowl. Transfer popovers to a wire rack set over a tray. Brush with butter and sprinkle over cinnamon sugar. Serve immediately.
